Package com.wrtr.wrtr.core.controllers

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
com.wrtr.wrtr.core.controllers.LoginController
@Controller public class LoginController extends Object
Controls creation and access of users

      Parameters:
      model - Model object we use to populate the template
      Returns:
      The register page

    • logout

      @GetMapping("/logout") public String logout()
      Return the logout confirmation page on "/logout"
      Returns:
      The logout page

    • registerPost

      @PostMapping("/register") public String registerPost(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @ModelAttribute("user") User user)
      Create a new account and redirect to "/login". Accessible on "/register" with POST method.
      Parameters:
      model - Model object we use to populate the template
      user - User object we work with
      Returns:
      The login page

    • getEditProfilePage

      @GetMapping("/editprofile") public String getEditProfilePage(org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Gets the page the user can use to change stuff about their profile. Accessed with GET "/editprofile"
      Parameters:
      model - Model object we use to populate the template
      authentication - The authentication object we use to determine the logged in user
      Returns:
      The editprofile template if the user matches

    • putEditProfile

      @PutMapping("/editprofile") public String putEditProfile(@ModelAttribute("userDto") UserDto userDto, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Used to actually change the profile of the user. Accessible with PUT "/editprofile"
      Parameters:
      userDto - The DTO object we got from the "/editprofile" page with the new data
      authentication - The authentication object we use to get the current logged in user
      model - Model object we use to populate the template
      Returns:
      Redirects to the user's profile if the credentials match. Otherwise redirects to the login page

    • getEditPassword

      @GetMapping("/editpassword") public String getEditPassword(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Return a page for editing the password
      Parameters:
      authentication - Authentication object
      Returns:
      The editpassword template

    • putEditPassword

      @PutMapping("/editpassword") public String putEditPassword(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication, @RequestParam("old") String oldPassword, @RequestParam("password") String newPassword)
      An endpoint used for changing user's password
      Parameters:
      authentication - Authentication object we use to identify a user
      oldPassword - User's old password
      newPassword - User's new password
      Returns:
      Asks user to retry if the old password is wrong, redirects to /myprofile otherwise
